snippet.title: Narita Boy -Story trailer
snippet.description:
Narita Boy - The retro-futuristic pixel game
Release: March 30, 2021
Platform: Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, Steam
Developer: Studio Koba (Barcelona)
Music: Salvinsky. 
Publisher: Team17

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1069530/Narita_Boy/

Follow us on:
https://twitter.com/studiokobaGAME
https://www.facebook.com/studiokobaGAME/
https://www.studiokoba.com
Kickstarter: https://goo.gl/g0Nkso
